quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door. – Coco Chanel
fact: The very first song played on MTV was `Video Killed The Radio Star` by the Buggles.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: My first time using an elevator was an uplifting experience. The second time let me down.
